wrongFullText:
New York Women in Film & Television will host A Conversation with Theresa Rebeck, in which the playwright and author will be interviewed by Tony Award-winning actress Julie White, to be held at 6:30pm on Tuesday, April 28 at the Eastman Kodak Company Theater (360 West 31st Street, 2nd Floor). The event is open to both the organization’s members and the public; seating is limited.

Rebeck and White are currently developing a comedy project titled Women’s Studies for HBO, and White has appeared in three of Rebeck’s plays, including Bad Dates. Rebeck’s play Our House will receive its New York premiere at Playwrights Horizons next month and her novel Three Girls and Their Brother has just been released in paperback.

Attendees may register online at www.nywift.org.
